meta.name: Futures Deck
meta.description: A speculative futures oracle for exploring emerging technologies

arc.name: Growth
arc.context: A world of continuous expansion, technological advancement, and economic growth. The logic of more, faster, bigger continues to drive civilization forward.

arc.name: Collapse
arc.description: A future where society has crumbled
arc.context: A world where the systems that held society together have failed. Whether through disaster, decay, or deliberate destruction, the old order is gone.

arc.name: Discipline
arc.description: A future of strict control and order
arc.context: A world of strict control, whether by governments, corporations, or algorithms. Order is maintained through monitoring, regulation, and enforcement.

arc.name: Transformation
arc.description: A future fundamentally different from today
arc.context: A world so fundamentally changed that people from today would barely recognize it. The basic assumptions of how society works have shifted entirely.

terrain.name: Agriculture
terrain.context: How we grow, process, and distribute food. The fundamental challenge of feeding humanity shapes technology, land use, and social organization.

terrain.name: Warfare
terrain.context: How violence is organized, threatened, and defended against. The tools and techniques of conflict shape power relations and national priorities.

terrain.name: Healthcare
terrain.context: How we maintain, repair, and enhance human bodies and minds. Healthcare systems shape who lives, who suffers, and what counts as normal.

terrain.name: Education
terrain.context: How knowledge and skills are transmitted across generations and distributed across society. Education shapes opportunity and capability.

terrain.name: The Ocean
terrain.description: Life on, in, or near the sea
terrain.context: The vast blue frontier covering most of Earth's surface. The ocean is food source, transport corridor, energy reservoir, and ecological system.

terrain.name: Governance
terrain.context: How collective decisions are made and enforced. Governance structures determine whose voice counts and how power flows through society.

terrain.name: Entertainment
terrain.context: How we spend our free time, seek pleasure, and express creativity. Entertainment shapes culture, attention, and shared experience.

terrain.name: Transport
terrain.context: How people and goods move through space. Transportation systems shape geography, trade, and the fabric of daily life.

terrain.name: Religion
terrain.context: How humans seek meaning, transcendence, and community through belief. Religion shapes values, identity, and the boundaries of the sacred.

terrain.name: Commerce
terrain.context: How value is created, exchanged, and accumulated. Commerce shapes who has resources, what gets made, and how people relate to each other.

terrain.name: Startups
terrain.context: How new ventures emerge, grow, and disrupt. Startups are engines of innovation, job creation, and creative destruction.

terrain.name: Arts & Culture
terrain.context: How societies express, preserve, and transmit meaning through creative works. Arts and culture shape identity, values, and collective memory.

terrain.name: Energy
terrain.context: How we generate, store, and distribute power. Energy systems underpin everything—every other terrain depends on reliable energy.

terrain.name: Housing
terrain.context: Where and how people live. Housing shapes wealth, community, commutes, and the physical texture of daily life.

terrain.name: Labor
terrain.context: How work is organized, compensated, and experienced. Labor systems determine who does what, for whom, and under what conditions.

terrain.name: Climate
terrain.context: Earth's changing climate and our response to it. Climate shapes migration, agriculture, conflict, and the long-term viability of civilization.

object.name: Device
object.context: A tangible technological artifact. Devices mediate our interaction with information, each other, and the physical world.

object.name: Law
object.context: A formal rule governing behavior. Laws shape what is permitted, punished, and possible within society.

object.name: Ritual
object.context: A repeated meaningful action marking transitions or creating belonging. Rituals bind communities and give shape to time.

object.name: Beverage
object.context: A liquid consumed for sustenance, pleasure, or effect. Beverages carry cultural meaning and shape social interaction.

object.name: Vehicle
object.context: A machine for moving through space. Vehicles shape how far we can go and how we experience the journey.

object.name: Building
object.context: An architectural creation enclosing space for human activity. Buildings shape how we live, work, and gather.

object.name: Garment
object.context: Something worn on the body. Garments protect, identify, and express who we are and where we belong.

object.name: Game
object.context: A structured form of play with rules and goals. Games entertain, teach, and reveal what a culture values.

object.name: Plant
object.context: A living organism from the plant kingdom. Plants feed, heal, beautify, and transform landscapes.

object.name: Advertisement
object.context: A message designed to influence behavior for commercial ends. Advertisements shape desire and fund media.

wellbeing.name: Autonomy
wellbeing.context: The freedom to act according to your own will and make your own choices. Being the author of your own life rather than following others' scripts.
wellbeing.positive: Expanded choices, self-governance tools, freedom to opt out
wellbeing.negative: Algorithmic manipulation, forced dependencies, illusory choices

wellbeing.name: Beauty
wellbeing.context: The experience of aesthetic pleasure—from nature, art, music, design. The human need to encounter and create harmony, elegance, and wonder.
wellbeing.positive: Beauty accessible to all, new aesthetic forms, environments designed for delight
wellbeing.negative: Uglification of spaces, beauty commodified, aesthetic homogenization

wellbeing.name: Comfort
wellbeing.context: Physical ease, relaxation, and freedom from discomfort. The baseline conditions that let us feel at ease in our bodies and environments.
wellbeing.positive: Effortless environments, pain eliminated, rest optimized
wellbeing.negative: Comfort addiction, atrophied resilience, numbing excess

wellbeing.name: Community
wellbeing.context: Being part of a group with shared identity and purpose. The need to belong to something larger than yourself and your immediate relationships.
wellbeing.positive: New tribes form, solidarity strengthened, collective identity renewed

wellbeing.name: Competence
wellbeing.context: Being capable and effective at what you do. The satisfaction of developing skills, solving problems, and achieving mastery through effort.
wellbeing.positive: Skills augmented, mastery accelerated, capability expanded
wellbeing.negative: Skills obsoleted, learned helplessness, competence outsourced

wellbeing.name: Fitness
wellbeing.context: Physical health, energy, and bodily capability. The foundation of vitality that enables everything else we want to do.
wellbeing.positive: Disease conquered, vitality enhanced, aging slowed
wellbeing.negative: New ailments, sedentary traps, health inequality

wellbeing.name: Impact
wellbeing.context: Having influence on your environment and the people around you. The need to make a difference, to matter, to leave a mark.
wellbeing.positive: Agency amplified, voices heard, contributions visible

wellbeing.name: Morality
wellbeing.context: Acting in accordance with your moral values. The need to live with integrity, to do what you believe is right, to be a good person.
wellbeing.positive: Values aligned with actions, ethical choices easy, integrity supported
wellbeing.negative: Moral compromise forced, values monetized, ethics bypassed

wellbeing.name: Purpose
wellbeing.context: Having direction and goals that feel meaningful. The sense that your life is going somewhere, that your efforts add up to something.
wellbeing.positive: New purposes emerge, paths clarified, meaning abundant
wellbeing.negative: Existential drift, purpose commodified, goals rendered meaningless

wellbeing.name: Recognition
wellbeing.context: Being acknowledged, appreciated, and respected by others. The need to be seen, valued, and have your contributions recognized.
wellbeing.positive: Merit recognized, contributions visible, respect distributed

wellbeing.name: Relatedness
wellbeing.context: Having close, warm relationships with people who care about you. Intimate bonds of friendship, family, and love that sustain us.
wellbeing.positive: Bonds deepened, intimacy enabled, care abundant

wellbeing.name: Security
wellbeing.context: Feeling safe and having a predictable, stable environment. The foundation of security that lets us plan and take risks.
wellbeing.positive: Risks managed, stability increased, safety nets strengthened
wellbeing.negative: New vulnerabilities, precarity normalized, security theater

wellbeing.name: Stimulation
wellbeing.context: Mental and physical stimulation through novelty, challenge, and variety. The need for excitement, new experiences, and escape from boredom.
wellbeing.positive: Wonder renewed, novelty abundant, engagement sustained

timeframe.name: Now
timeframe.context: This is happening right now. The future is already here.

timeframe.name: 6 Months
timeframe.context: Just around the corner. Close enough to feel real, plan for, worry about.

timeframe.name: 1 Year
timeframe.context: A single orbit around the sun. Long enough for significant change, short enough to imagine clearly.

timeframe.name: 2 Years
timeframe.context: The near future. Plans made today will have played out. Trends visible now will have matured.

timeframe.name: 5 Years
timeframe.context: The medium term. Children grow up, companies transform, technologies mature. Recognizable but different.

timeframe.name: 10 Years
timeframe.context: A full decade. Enough time for fundamental transformation. The world your future self will inhabit.

timeframe.name: 20 Years
timeframe.context: A generation away. Today's children will be adults. Today's adults will be elders. A genuinely different world.

modifiers.label: Major Breakthrough
modifiers.context: An unexpected scientific leap accelerates everything.

modifiers.label: Accelerated Funding
modifiers.context: Massive investment surge—wartime-level mobilization of resources.

technology.name: Fault-Tolerant Quantum
technology.context: Quantum computers that can run indefinitely without accumulating errors. The holy grail that makes all other quantum applications possible.

technology.name: Quantum Cryptography
technology.context: Communication that's provably secure—any eavesdropping attempt instantly detectable through the laws of physics.

technology.name: Quantum AI
technology.context: AI systems that think in ways classical computers cannot simulate. Oracles that give correct answers but cannot explain their reasoning.

technology.name: Quantum Sensing
technology.context: Sensors of extraordinary precision—detecting diseases before symptoms, navigating without GPS, seeing through walls.

technology.name: Quantum Simulation
technology.context: Simulating nature at the quantum level—designing drugs in days, discovering superconductors, understanding protein folding.

technology.name: AGI
technology.context: AI that can perform any intellectual task a human can. The threshold beyond which machine intelligence becomes self-improving.

technology.name: Brain-Computer Interface
technology.context: Technology that reads and writes to the brain directly—restoring senses, enhancing memory, enabling telepathy.

technology.name: Synthetic Biology
technology.context: Programming life itself—custom organisms that produce fuel, food, medicine, or materials on demand.

technology.name: Fusion Power
technology.context: The power of the sun, contained on Earth. Abundant, clean energy that could reshape civilization.

technology.name: Room-Temp Superconductors
technology.context: Materials with zero electrical resistance at room temperature—transforming power grids, transportation, and computing.

prompt.name: The Innovator
prompt.context: Consider the inventors, entrepreneurs, researchers, and dreamers who build new technologies. What motivates them? What obstacles do they face?

prompt.name: The Incumbent
prompt.context: Consider those whose power, wealth, or identity is threatened by this future. How do they adapt, obstruct, or co-opt the change?

prompt.name: The Citizen
prompt.context: Consider ordinary people living through this transition. What new rituals, habits, and anxieties emerge? What is gained and lost?

prompt.name: The Edge Case
prompt.context: Consider those who don't fit the default assumptions. Who is left behind, exploited, or forgotten in this future?

prompt.name: The Unintended
prompt.context: Consider second and third-order effects. What unforeseen consequences emerge? What problems does this solution create?

prompt.name: The Threshold
prompt.description: What is the point of no return?
prompt.context: Consider the moment when this future becomes inevitable. What event, decision, or breakthrough locks in this path?
